abstract: Google is showing users how it takes data from their history of searches and their location to customize the results it displays. So far it is not displaying similar information about data it uses to target advertising.
snippet: Google is showing users how it takes data from their history of searches and their location to customize the results it displays. So far it is not displaying similar information about data it uses to target advertising.
lead_paragraph: Many things are scarier when they are in the shadows. This is especially true when it comes to the ways big companies gather and use data about us.

headline.main: Peeking Into Google’s Use of Data
